00023 class Exception : public std::exception {
00024 
00025 public:
00031     Exception(const std::string& msg, int code = 0);
00032 
00036     Exception(const std::string& msg, const std::string& arg, int code = 0);
00037 
00039     Exception(const Exception& exc);
00040 
00042     virtual ~Exception() throw();
00044 
00048     Exception& operator=(const Exception& exc);
00050 
00054     virtual const char* name() const throw();
00055 
00057     virtual const char* className() const throw();
00058 
00060     virtual const char* what() const throw();
00061 
00063     const std::string& message() const;
00064 
00066     int code() const;
00067 
00069     std::string displayText() const;
00070 
00072     virtual void rethrow() const;
00074 
00075 protected:
00079     Exception(int code = 0);
00080 
00082     void message(const std::string& msg);
00083 
00087     void extendedMessage(const std::string& arg);
00088 
00089 private:
00090     std::string m_msg; 
00091     int m_code; 
00092 };
00093 
00095 inline const char* Exception::name() const throw() {
00096     return "Exception";
00097 }
00098 
00099 
00100 inline const char* Exception::className() const throw() {
00101     return typeid(*this).name();
00102 }
00103 
00104 
00105 inline const char* Exception::what() const throw() {
00106     return name();
00107 }
00108 
00109 inline const std::string& Exception::message() const {
00110     return m_msg;
00111 }
00112 
00113 inline int Exception::code() const {
00114     return m_code;
00115 }
00116 
00117 inline void Exception::rethrow() const {
00118     throw *this;
00119 }
00120 
00121 inline void Exception::message(const std::string& msg) {
00122     m_msg = msg;
00123 }

00126 #define MT_EXCEPTION(CLS, ARGS)   \
00127         {                         \
00128             std::stringstream ss; \
00129             ss << ARGS;           \
00130             throw CLS(ss.str());  \
00131         }
00132 
00134 #define MT_EXCEPTION_ASSERT(CONDITION, ARGS) \
00135         {\
00136                 if(!(CONDITION))                                                                                                                \
00137                         MT_EXCEPTION(mt::Exception, ARGS)\
00138         }
00139 
00141 #define MT_DECLARE_EXCEPTION(CLS, BASE) \
00142     class CLS : public BASE {                                              \
00143     public:                                                                \
00144         CLS(int code = 0);                                                 \
00145         CLS(const std::string& msg, int code = 0);                         \
00146         CLS(const std::string& msg, const std::string& arg, int code = 0); \
00147         CLS(const CLS& exc);                                               \
00148         virtual ~CLS() throw();                                            \
00149         CLS& operator=(const CLS& exc);                                    \
00150         const char* name() const throw();                                  \
00151         const char* className() const throw();                             \
00152         void rethrow() const;                                              \
00153     };
00154 
00156 #define MT_IMPLEMENT_EXCEPTION(CLS, BASE, NAME)                                                   \
00157     CLS::CLS(int code) : BASE(code) { }                                                           \
00158     CLS::CLS(const std::string& msg, int code) : BASE(msg, code) { }                              \
00159     CLS::CLS(const std::string& msg, const std::string& arg, int code) : BASE(msg, arg, code) { } \
00160     CLS::CLS(const CLS& exc) : BASE(exc) { }                                                      \
00161     CLS::~CLS() throw() { }                                                                       \
00162     CLS& CLS::operator=(const CLS& exc) {                                                         \
00163         BASE::operator=(exc);                                                                     \
00164         return *this;                                                                             \
00165     }                                                                                             \
00166     const char* CLS::name() const throw() { return NAME; }                                        \
00167     const char* CLS::className() const throw() { return typeid(*this).name(); }                   \
00168     void CLS::rethrow() const { throw *this; }
